Author: bcshop.io
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Community Development Campaign Announcement  To promote the launch of the first feature-full blockchain-based e-commerce and e-payments platform, in accordance with art. 14 of Appendix to General Terms & Conditions of BCS Tokens Sale, with this letter BCShop.io announces comprehensive community development campaign. The campaign will consist of several different activities and reward pools.  Token Holders Promotion  This promotion is dedicated to our early token holders who obtained BCS tokens before actual mainnet release thus helping to make BCShop.io platform into reality. We will make ALL token holders snapshot at 15th of May 2018 and 200k tokens will be reserved for distribution between those token holders in the snapshot. Tokens will be rewarded proportionally to token holdings so 200k tokens will lead to ~60% reward given the current circulating supply of 332k tokens.  Note:  It is obligatory for you to qualify for the reward. We ask you to write your feedback about BCShop.io platform (after mainnet release) in a free form at telegra.ph and send it to bounty@bcshop.io, don’t forget to specify your wallet address with BCS tokens. The qualification process is conditioned by regulators recommendations and team’s adherence to Customer Development approach. Your valuable feedback will be used to improve the platform and deliver better experience to all its users.  We will start sending rewards weekly after mainnet release and there will be no set deadline so feel free to qualify at your convenience. Sharing your personal experience in social media networks is very much appreciated.  Be sure that you hold tokens on personal wallets, exchange wallets are not supported.  Airdrop Campaign  10k tokens will be distributed for 1000 members randomly chosen from those who qualified. To qualify, follow instructions in bounty campaign channel: https://t.me/bcshop_bounty. We will determine 1000 people to receive 10 BCS tokens each with the help of random.org website. For the process to be transparent, fair and verifiable, we will use the hash code of the first Ethereum block mined after 1:11 AM (UTC) 1st of June 2018 as a persistent random seed. Thus, every participant of the airdrop will be able to verify winners’ sequence itself.  We will start sending BCS tokens to its’ new lucky holders right after winning sequence is generated, June 1st.  Bounty Campaign  Bounty campaign fund of 100 ETH will be distributed between social media influencers. The following content will be accepted:  - Video review of the BCShop.io platform - Video or text (with screenshots) introduction of BCShop.io platform - Other content featuring BCShop.io, comparing it to other blockchain based competitors, introduction of BCS token functions, etc[/li][/list]  Non-speculative content is expected, with actual observations of the platform’s functions and token usage after mainnet release. To apply for the bounty campaign, send us your introduction to bounty@bcshop.io. We will carefully consider all applications and choose several candidates to cooperate with.   About BCShop.io BCShop.io project aims to reinvent the way digital commerce and payments work today. Focusing on digital goods and services area project’s goal is to enhance it with fast-growing opportunities blockchain technologies and cryptocurrencies have to offer. In January 2018 BCShop.io hit hard cap of 2000 ETH at its token sale.

Author: Clinton_Rodgers
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Dear community, today we want to share our plans regarding platform’s commercial release in May 2018.  Basically, each user of the platform will have two different ways of interacting with the platform: Offer and Explore. Both of them are described below.  Offer This option allows to create an offer of good or service backed by smart-contract on Ethereum blockchain. The process is built the way that all technical details stay behind the scene and user may not even know that he is using blockchain while still getting all the benefits.  Offer created by user will be accessible all around the world and can be easily paid in a few minutes. Additional features are available:  - Limited time offers: allows to set exact date and time when the offer is active. - Limited quantity offers: allows to limits the amount of goods or services that is being offered. - Wholesale purchases: allows of purchasing several goods at once.  Making an offer on BCShop.io platform allows you to have fundamental features of online shops extended by blockchain benefits and setup costs close to zero.  Explore This option allows to explore different approved offers available on the platform. This will allow our partners to stay visible and attract additional traffic to their business while providing customers with easy, secure and reliable way to pay.  While all partners’ offers in “explore” section will be categorized and carefully monitored by the team to comply with the law and regulations, P2P offers will not be monitored but following terms and conditions is still required.  Short Links All offers on the platform will be accessible via short links which looks like this: bcshop.io/<ID> where <ID> is unique identifier of product or service. Sharing an offer is as simple as sharing a short link, no more third-party websites, payment gateways and other middlemen involved.  No more long unreadable addresses! No more black holes on the recipient’s end! Pay fast and easy and know what you pay for! Furthermore, now you can bookmark your favorite deals and get back to them in one click!  Additional Features There are more things planned to be included in commercial release. Here are the biggest ones:  - Price lists. Offer different goods and services included in one price lists if you wish so. - Reports. Available both for merchants and customers. Now you can check all your transactions made on the platform and export the history to your device. - Edit your offers. Correct! You will be able edit prices, quantities, dates, etc. Smart-contracts allow for this. - Different payment options. We are starting with ETH and BCS and others will be added gradually. - Cross-device. The platform is accessible from any device with no software installation required and with no registration needed.  Ethereum ecosystem is going to be boosted and mainstreamed. Be part of it with BCShop.io!

Author: Wesley_Cox
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Anyone buying goods or services from overseas has probably run up across Paypal or other e-commerce gateways. It’s pretty convenient, but there’s a huge issue around conversion costs and fees — they eat into the slim margins for retailers and often end up passed on to consumers. Added to that, there’s a real security risk, and Paypal accounts have been hacked before.  Bringing e-commerce into a decentralised platform enables a more fair playing ground and makes ecommerce much safer. Vladlen’s company, BCShop.io, has started the process to create such a platform. Here he is to tell us more about it https://medium.com/@bcshop.io/secure-decentralised-e-commerce-through-bcshop-io-interview-79f8e8ee64e9

Author: Dannys_Byrch
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Stage 1: Commercial Release in May 2018. Accepted currency: ETH Soft cap: 300 ETH Hard cap: 2000 ETH Minimum investment : no Bonuses:   18% for week 1 decreases by 2% every week Additional 2% if more than 1 ETH invested  FAQ Q: Why so low caps? A: We are experienced and highly effective team focused on development. We don’t need more to deliver commercial product. Q: How many tokens will be distributed? How many tokens were already distributed? A: Up to 242 000 tokens will be distributed at this stage. ~20 000 tokens were already distributed during presale and bounty campaign. Q: What happens with undistributed tokens? A: There are 10m tokens total. All undistributed tokens will be frozen until commercial release. They will be moved to long-term development fund and will be unlocked for project development needs during next stages. Each stage unlocks small amount and is publicly announced at least 30 days before. Q: Are you going to exchanges? A: Sure, we will be applying to all major exchanges after token sale is finished. We already implemented Bancor protocol which guarantees decentralized exchange with 0% fees.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar? The major difference is on the fundamental level – it is use of the mechanism which the platform is based on. BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Body: We want to thank every of our presale investors and assure that we are working hard to deliver the platform that can greatly enhance Ethereum users’ experience and allow easy integration of Ethereum for business.  Meanwhile, if you are willing to become an investor, kindly apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScY6F9sOPX4ls4KaxzZy47u2oYkFlLiBiAelEeVgpu-Lq9b6A/viewform

Author: Edwin_Bradford
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Whats new? - We’ve developed easy to use lists of all your products and vendors. They combine detailed summary of your services with links to quickly check all the purchases - Now you can edit any of your products’ properties. For example in the case if price or product limits were changed - Now you can also change the Ethereum address that receives customers’ payments and even your displayable name - Price-lists introduced. All of your products in a single spreadsheet that you can share with customers - We’ve redesigned information messages to be more user-friendly and clear, less Ethereum-related technical stuff - However if you still need the raw transaction that was sent to blockchain, you can find it in ‘Transaction details’ - System performance was greatly improved  https://medium.com/@bcshop.io/big-update-presale-results-bitcoin-com-and-icoalert-com-use-cases-e68e8ec85df6

Author: Auster_Fisher
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we able to offer such good conditions? There are a few reasons: 1. As we use blockchain, we do not need our own data centers, we do not have to cover the costs of maintaining data integrity and protecting data from hackers. 2. Cost of making a transaction and creating a product/service offer in Ethereum cryptocurrency is just a few cents. 3. BCShop.io business model does not involve gaining profits by the company itself. All gathered fees are aggregated to a specially created smart contract and are weekly distributed between token holders. This approach allows the company organizational activity costs to remain as low as possible. 4. Use of smart contracts makes it possible to achieve maximum formalization of a seller`s product/service offer, automate delivery processes in general and money back function in particular, with no extra fees.

Author: Wesley_Cox
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io November Progress Update  Conference Attendance We visited three conferences in Moscow where we pitched the project to potential investors.  Advisory Board We also started to form an Advisory Board, which comprises experts from various fields.  Bancor Partnership We have also partnered with Bancor, which will enable us to allow the easy conversion of BCS tokens so that they can be used to buy, sell, or exchange with other tokens.  Minimum Viable Product One of the biggest accomplishments we’ve made with regards to the project is the release of a minimum viable product (MVP.) You can access it at https://testnet.bcshop.io/ for testing.  Token Presale Status We have less than weeks left for the presale. With it ending on December 15, we will now start cancelling many of the current reservations in order to allow for new contributors.  SAFT (Simple Agreement for Future Tokens) The SAFT for our project is currently being developed and will soon go live. This will allow us to accept accredited investors from the US, Canada, and China.  More https://medium.com/@bcshop.io/bcshop-io-november-progress-update-54f100a661ff

Author: Wesley_Cox
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io use case: online tutoring and webinars Nowadays organizing events as private consultancy, paid webinars, tutoring, etc. requires the organizer to do a lot of routing work; to be able to provide high quality service, they also quite often invest money. Let us consider some organizational challenges with the example of conducting a commercial webinar https://medium.com/@bcshop.io/bcshop-io-use-case-online-tutoring-and-webinars-5d8abc58c14c

Author: Edwin_Bradford
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An  average  fee  that  sellers  have  to  pay  for  each  received  online  payment  today  is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More  than  that,  users  usually  should  pay  a  fee  for  transferring  money  out from  the  payment  system  to  the  bank  account.  Besides,  payment  systems  charge additional   moneyback fees,   may   charge inactive account   fees,   cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Author: Edwin_Bradford
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a  summary  rate  for  the  vendor,  based  on  all  theproducts  offered  by  the  vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings. So, when viewing information about a product or a vendor, the customer sees a true-life experience of other customers dealing with this product/vendor.

BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Body: Why you don’t use slack? Unfortunately,  there  are  so  many  fraudulent  acts  with  slack  and  we  decided to abandon this channel for the maximum safety of users and investors.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Bancor  protocol  allows  tokens  to  participate  in  exchange  (purchase/sale)  without any  need  in  being  listed  on  exchanges.  Tokens  can  be  purchased/  sold  from  the reserve unilaterally, and the price will be defined by current reserve volume. Token price  decreases  with  the  reserve  volume  growth,  and  increases  with  the  reserve depletion. That allows to create supply and demand balance and form token price. No fees  apply  when  working  with  the  reserve,  which  makes  this  approach  more profitable in comparison with exchange trade.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io is aimed at attracting new vendorswho would like to accept payments in cryptocurrency,  as  well  as working  with  acting  retailers  in  order  to  integrate  their operating business with our service.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io   allows   to   completely automate the   trade   due   to use   of   smart contracts   and   its   own   delivery   application.   The   application   continuously processes    incoming    payments,    which    guarantees    delivering    purchased products to the buyer. Furthermore, the vendor does not have to worry about keeping  and  protecting  information  about  the  product – all  necessary  data  is stored on blockchain.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: First, a user does not need to buy special tokens to purchase game currency, skins or tickets as in the projects mentioned above. Payment is made directly in ETH. Second, as opposed to mentioned above highly specialized projects, BCShop.io is more general and can be applied to a larger number of varied fields. Therefore, BCShop.io solves the problem of stock exchange liquidity and listing due to bancor protocol, so that a tokens holder can exchange them at any moment, and anybody can become a holder. Fourth, unlike the mentioned above projects, BCShop.io has a built-in customer products rating system based on smart-contracts.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop does not change degree of anonymity of Ethereum. Buyer`s e-mail (or identification), which a buyer provides for receiving a product, is stored on blockchain in the encrypted form.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why is there a limited number of investors during PreTGE stage? At  this  stage,  our  task  is  to  provide  an  individual  approach  and  maximum  security within   the   available   resources.   We   believe   that   working   with   each   investor individually,  we  will  be  able  to  conduct  the  PreTGE  campaign  as  efficiently  as possible.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why do you use two different tokens? Our task is to increase the volume of long-term contributions relative to speculative, so we introduce such mechanics that will stimulate holding the BCS tokens longer. We believe that this approach will create a more healthy ecosystem of our project in the long term.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We   will   send   listing   applications   to   all   of   the   recognized   stock   exchanges. Independently from tokens listing on stock exchange, liquidity problem is solved by using bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). Tokens will be available for exchange within the first few days after TGE completion.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why you don’t use slack? Unfortunately,  there  are  so  many  fraudulent  acts  with  slack  and  we  decided to abandon this channel for the maximum safety of users and investors.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: All the data related to a service or product sale terms, as well as related to completed transactions  is  stored  on  blockchain. In  comparison  to  the  classical  approach,  your shop  is  much  more  protected  against  any  hacking  or  data  loss,  as blockchain guarantees a more efficient means of protection for your data.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: When  working  with  payments  gateways  you  should  resolve  all  issues  with  the product  delivery  yourself  and  you  should  control  the  process.  If  you  are  using  our service, you can download a standard BCShopApp and set it up (yourself or with our help), this will  immediately  resolve  the  issue  of  your  customers  receiving  products automatically.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Body: For extra protection against dishonest vendors, the rating system considers the price which the product was purchased for. That makes it impossible to drive up the ratings by offering a very low price and then start to sell the product for a high price; as the first negative rating will overpower all the positive ratings. When viewing a product, buyers can also see a summary vendor rating, which is calculated based on the summary ratings of all the products offered by that vendor.

Very often, the inability to get compensation in cases of webinar cancellation, or a performer’s incompetence/carelessness. 3. Frequently, the inability to leave a review about the webinar for future clients, due to the platform’s restricted functions.  4. Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An  average  fee  that  sellers  have  to  pay  for  each  received  online  payment  today  is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More  than  that,  users  usually  should  pay  a  fee  for  transferring  money  out from  the  payment  system  to  the  bank  account.  Besides,  payment  systems  charge additional   moneyback fees,   may   charge inactive account   fees,   cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Body: Let us consider some difficulties and risks from a participant’s side: 1. Need to make payments by methods convenient for the organizer, not the client, often with additional bank fees.  2. Very often, the inability to get compensation in cases of webinar cancellation, or a performer’s incompetence/carelessness. 3. Frequently, the inability to leave a review about the webinar for future clients, due to the platform’s restricted functions.  4. Often, the inability to stay anonymous in a case where a client would prefer to do that.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: A vendor can use the website for tracking basic information about products and for monitoring the course of the sales. The following features are available through the website: 1.Output  of  the  information  about the  products  connected  to  the Vendor Contract. 2.Review of data on every product. 3.Editing product data (price, quantity, sale period, etc.) 4.Removing products from sale.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: If  a  vendor performs  delivery,  they  choose a delivery  method by themselves and deliver paid product to the delivery address entered during the payment. In  case  of  automated  elivery,  payments  are  tracked with  the  help  of  BCShopApp application running  on vendors end.  The  application keeps  record  and  performs delivery of the product in accordance with a set algorithm. See chapter BCShopApp for more details.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShopApp,  the application for delivering DPS(digital  product  or  service), tracks activity of   public   key   relevant   to   this   DPS   and   processes   incoming   payments automatically.  Processing  usually  comes  down  to  sending  a  letter  with  the  product code  or  some  other  action  relevant to  providing DPS  from  the  vendor`s  side  (for example, transferring game currency).

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An  average  fee  that  sellers  have  to  pay  for  each  received  online  payment  today  is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More  than  that,  users  usually  should  pay  a  fee  for  transferring  money  out from  the  payment  system  to  the  bank  account.  Besides,  payment  systems  charge additional   moneyback fees,   may   charge inactive account   fees,   cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io allows to completely automate the trade due to use of smart contracts and its own delivery application. The application continuously processes incoming payments, which guarantees delivering purchased products to the buyer. Furthermore, the vendor does not have to worry about keeping and protecting information about the product – all necessary data is stored on blockchain.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: As for today, PreSale will be running for two more months during which we expect many interesting things to happen: - Full cycle alfa vesrion will be released. It will allow vendors to create “vendor smart-contracts” and “digital goods smart-contracts” and buyers to access those contracts to make a purchase. - We will do some networking at upcoming blockchain conferences and workshops in Moscow and (probably) Saint-Petersburg. - We will finish our pitch deck and present it to the public. It will allow to understand the nature BCShop.io in simple and intuitive way. - Couple more rounds of airdrops will be held. Everyone can join to get familiar with our platform and to receive some promo-tokens in the proccess.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Independently from tokens listing on stock exchange, liquidity problem is solved by using bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). Tokens will be available for exchange within the first few days after TGEcompletion.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is BCShop.io? BCShop.io is a platform for selling digital products and services, based on smart�contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. BCShop.io allows vendors to publish information about digital products and services, and customers – to purchase these products and services for Ethereum cryptocurrency. At that, all the data concerning products is stored as a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We constantly monitor technological development and consider the possibility of integration with other blockchains supporting smart contracts, which offer enough opportunities to implement BCShop.io functionality.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io fees do not exceed 2% for all our partners, and it is just 0.5% for major partners.  In addition, BCShop.io does not have any extra hidden fees and, more than that, implements integration and further support according to our partners` requests for free.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a  summary  rate  for  the  vendor,  based  on  all  theproducts  offered  by  the  vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings. So, when viewing information about a product or a vendor, the customer sees a true-life experience of other customers dealing with this product/vendor.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Speaking  of  other  projects,  there  are  companies  that  have  recently  finished  a  successful ICO,  and  they  are  aimed  at  receiving  payments  in  their  own  currency  units  (tokens). However, their users have to exchange basic Ethereum currency to particular tokens before they are able to use the project services. This exchange is also associated with paying fees, which means additional time is spent by the user.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar? The major difference is on the fundamental level – it is use of the mechanism which the platform is based on. BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Let us consider some difficulties and risks from a participant’s side: 1. Need to make payments by methods convenient for the organizer, not the client, often with additional bank fees.  2. Very often, the inability to get compensation in cases of webinar cancellation, or a performer’s incompetence/carelessness. 3. Frequently, the inability to leave a review about the webinar for future clients, due to the platform’s restricted functions.  4. Often, the inability to stay anonymous in a case where a client would prefer to do that.

We offer a convenient, decentralized, solution that possesses a variety of advantages:  1. No intermediaries in making payments and saving on fees 2. Automated payments registration and tickets delivery 3. The possibility to get a refund automatically (if expressed in the event terms and conditions) 4. Holding a webinar on the base of Google Hangouts, automated participants admission and tickets check.

Body: All BCShop.io transactions are performed by using the Ethereum blockchain. With it, an average transaction completion time is just a few minutes, regardless of the sender and recipient location.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io arranges a product/service to be delivered as a smart contract which already includes controlling most of the necessary features: account of the product volume for sale, ability to establish money back timeline with automated free processing, and ability of wholesale opportunities.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: And the whole process of sale is done on blockchain, without any need for vendors to have their own server! The ability of fractional (not per-item) sale is worth mentioning too: in this case the amount of product is defined by the payment amount. This approach is convenient in many niches, for example, selling premium game currency.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io offers its users the chance to keep up with the times, broaden the range of potential customers with cryptocurrency holders. Our service is not a just another payment gate, but a fully-featured solution for the future economy based on blockchain.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Moreover, upon request, BCShop.io implements integration with external, out-ofblockchain world for interrelation with other sale channels, and for implementing other required features for its vendors.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a summary rate for the vendor, based on all the products offered by the vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Payment within the BCShop.io service means transferring Ethereum cryptocurrency for digital product or service (DPS) to the smart contact defining the conditions of sale/providing this DPS.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Early investors will receive a 50% token bonus; that being said, 150 BCS tokens will be deposited for 1 ETH.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we able to offer such good conditions? There are a few reasons: 1. As we use blockchain, we do not need our own data centers, we do not have to cover the costs of maintaining data integrity and protecting data from hackers. 2. Cost of making a transaction and creating a product/service offer in Ethereum cryptocurrency is just a few cents. 3. BCShop.io business model does not involve gaining profits by the company itself. All gathered fees are aggregated to a specially created smart contract and are weekly distributed between token holders. This approach allows the company organizational activity costs to remain as low as possible. 4. Use of smart contracts makes it possible to achieve maximum formalization of a seller`s product/service offer, automate delivery processes in general and money back function in particular, with no extra fees.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: A large part (80%) of the commission collected on the platform goes to provide ETH value of bonus tokens.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Sometimes buyers need to send payments by means of bank transfer. In this case, time necessary to complete a transaction may take up to a few business days; especially with international transfers, and that is extremely inconvenient for the user.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar? The major difference is on the fundamental level – it is use of the mechanism which the platform is based on. BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Registration  of  digital products and  services (DPS) for sale is done with the help of our  website bcshop.io.  To  do  this  a  vendor needs  to  provide  their Vendor Contract and fill in a few blank fields describing the DPS (see Creating a  DPS offer). As a result of the  registration  the  seller  gets  the  address  of  registered  DPS  smart  contract (further DPS contract) which buyers will use for payments.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io is aimed at attracting new vendors who would like to accept payments in cryptocurrency, as well as working with acting retailers in order to integrate their operating business with our service.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io  fees  do  not  exceed  2%  for  all  our  partners,  and  it  is  just  0.5%  for major partners.  In addition, BCShop.io does not have any extra hidden fees and, more than that, implements integration and further support according to our partners` requests for free.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Rating system is established at the smart contracts level and it is based on the experience of real customers only.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We are happy to anounce that we reached a pre-agreement with Law&Trust International on intergrating with BCShop.io platform to enable ETH payments for legal services. Law&Trust is the most demanded company in Russia and some other countries providing legal support if ICOs as well as other legal services.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An  average  fee  that  sellers  have  to  pay  for  each  received  online  payment  today  is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More  than  that,  users  usually  should  pay  a  fee  for  transferring  money  out from  the  payment  system  to  the  bank  account.  Besides,  payment  systems  charge additional   moneyback fees,   may   charge inactive account   fees,   cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is the difference between BCShop and regular payment gateways?  First of all, it is much easier to create a product or service offer through BCShop: you do not need your own website, you do not need to register in payment gates, and you do not need a server for storing shop activity data.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: With BCshop you'll be able to compete on a level playing field with your biggest competitors, except you'll now have the advantage of accepting crypto-currencies and using smart contracts to automate your transactions. The great thing about smart contracts ? They happen almost instantly with 100% credibility. That's progress !

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Quite  often  a  buyer  cannot  purchase  a  product  in  the  seller`s  currency.  In  this  case,  a purchase  is  made  through  automatic  conversion;  whether  at  the  rate  estimated  by  the payment  system  or  at  the  processing  operator  (Visa/  Mastercard)  rate  (if  the  buyer  pays with  a  credit  card).  A  regular  fee  charged  is  no  less  than  1%.  In  some  cases,  users  face double conversion, and then they must pay even more fees.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: First, a user does not need to buy special tokens to purchase game currency, skins or tickets as in the projects mentioned above. Payment is made directly in ETH.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Our platform is aimed at simplification, price reduction, and the improvement of service during hosting such events. We offer a convenient, decentralized, solution that possesses a variety of advantages:  1. No intermediaries in making payments and saving on fees 2. Automated payments registration and tickets delivery 3. The possibility to get a refund automatically (if expressed in the event terms and conditions) 4. Holding a webinar on the base of Google Hangouts, automated participants admission and tickets check.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io use case: online tutoring and webinars Nowadays organizing events as private consultancy, paid webinars, tutoring, etc. requires the organizer to do a lot of routing work; to be able to provide high quality service, they also quite often invest money. Let us consider some organizational challenges with the example of conducting a commercial webinar https://medium.com/@bcshop.io/bcshop-io-use-case-online-tutoring-and-webinars-5d8abc58c14c

BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: With the help of BCShop.io one can place an offer selling a digital service or product on blockchain within just a few clicks and potential customers can also complete the purchase with only a few clicks. It is worth noting a buyer completes the transaction in ETH and does notneed to buy any special tokens.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Vendors   usually   have   to   arrange   this   processing additionally,  at  the  stage  of  issuing  invoices  or/and  after  the  payment  is  received. Frequently part of the functions is implemented with the help of online stores or other ready solutions. However, that requires spending extra time and money.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An average fee that sellers have to pay for each received online payment today is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More than that, users usually should pay a fee for transferring money out from the payment system to the bank account. Besides, payment systems charge additional money back fees, may charge inactive account fees, cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: When tokens are passed from one holder to another, all the bonus tokens which was allocated to the first holder by the time of passing, is still available to them. In this case, previous token holders can get their bonus tokens by the regular way by sending one BCS token to the smart contact.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Vendors create smart contracts with the help of our website bcshop.io. To do this a vendor just fills in the blank fields related to their business, they do not need to have any specific technical knowledge. The result of creating a smart contract is the address of this smart contract. Created smart contracts are signed with a vendor`s private key and are stored on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io solves the problem of conversion fees by avoiding using its own currency and instead, maintaining all transactions in “native” Ethereum currency. That being said, by working with our service users will save time and money.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io is aimed at attracting new vendors who would like to accept payments in cryptocurrency, as well as working with acting retailers in order to integrate their operating business with our service.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An  average  fee  that  sellers  have  to  pay  for  each  received  online  payment  today  is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More  than  that,  users  usually  should  pay  a  fee  for  transferring  money  out from  the  payment  system  to  the  bank  account.  Besides,  payment  systems  charge additional   moneyback fees,   may   charge inactive account   fees,   cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a summary rate for the vendor, based on all the products offered by the vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Our main competitive advantages:  • low fees  • no required conversion of funds during transactions • fast transactions  • decentralized data storage  • free integration with operating businesses  • user friendly and convenient service for customers and for vendors. • Products rating system

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: A vendor who wants to use our service first should complete registration which will result  in  receiving  an  address  of  their  personal  smart  contract  (further Vendor Contract). During the registration, a vendor needs to only fill in one necessary blank field: the Ethereum  wallet  address  which  will  receive  the  payment  for  delivered products or services. Additionally, the vendor can fill in the field: Vendor Name (not required).

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: If you are an author of an interesting and popular channel or blog in social networks, twitter, instagram, telegram or other social media, and are interested in advertising cooperation, we would like to discuss this possibility with you on an individual basis. For placing quality content in popular channels, we are ready to offer up to 1000 BCS tokens (in exceptional cases, more). Leave an application for participation here, or in a private message.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We are happy to present BCShop.io: a universal service for selling digital goods or  services as  software  codes,  game  currency,  e-books,  discount  coupons, online conference tickets, electronic tickets to live events, etc. How are we able to offer such good conditions? There are a few reasons: 1.As we use blockchain, we do not need our own data centers, we do not have to cover the costs of maintaining data integrity and protecting data from hackers. 2.Cost of making a transaction and creating a product/service offer in Ethereum cryptocurrency is just a few cents. 3.BCShop.io  business  model  does  not  involve  gaining  profits  by  the  company itself. All gathered fees are aggregated to a specially created smart contract and are  weekly  distributed  between  token  holders.  This  approach  allows  the company organizational activity costs to remain as low as possible. 4.Use of smart contracts makes it possible to achieve maximum formalization of a  seller`s  product/service  offer,  automate  delivery  processes  in  general  and money back function in particular, with no extra fees.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: All BCShop.io transactions are performed by using the Ethereum blockchain. With it,  an  average  transaction  completion  time  is  just  a  few  minutes,  regardless  of  the sender and recipient location.

Author: yogetucecu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: As for today, PreSale will be running for two more months during which we expect many interesting things to happen: - Full cycle alfa vesrion will be released. It will allow vendors to create “vendor smart-contracts” and “digital goods smart-contracts” and buyers to access those contracts to make a purchase. - We will do some networking at upcoming blockchain conferences and workshops in Moscow and (probably) Saint-Petersburg. - We will finish our pitch deck and present it to the public. It will allow to understand the nature BCShop.io in simple and intuitive way. - Couple more rounds of airdrops will be held. Everyone can join to get familiar with our platform and to receive some promo-tokens in the proccess.

Your participation in our airdrops and your feedback on our platform was amazing. While still working on alfa release on testnet we already scheduled another airdrop round for the November, we promise it to be the most interesting and action packed round so far! https://medium.com/@bcshop.io/bcshop-io-october-progress-update-a2fbbc19eb7f

Author: xiyehunako
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io allows to completely automate the trade due to use of smart contracts and its own delivery application. The application continuously processes incoming payments, which guarantees delivering purchased products to the buyer. Furthermore, the vendor does not have to worry about keeping and protecting information about the product – all necessary data is stored on blockchain.

We provide the implementation of such functions according to vendors’ needs. The implementation of the functions may be as well done by vendors themselves.

As a result of the  registration  the  seller  gets  the  address  of  registered  DPS  smart  contract (further DPS contract) which buyers will use for payments.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: All BCShop.io transactions are performed by using the Ethereum blockchain. With it, an average transaction completion time is just a few minutes, regardless of the sender and recipient location.

Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar? The major difference is on the fundamental level – it is use of the mechanism which the platform is based on. BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Quite often customers do not have an opportunity to rate products purchased or view other customers` product ratings and sellers` performance. Sometimes this problem is solved with the help of third-party services, or vendors themselves install extra features. None of these approaches guarantee authenticity of the data seen by the customer.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Ideally only customers who have really purchased a product should have the opportunity to rate it. Smart contracts make implementation of such features possible on the essential level.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Our main competitive advantages: • low fees • no required conversion of funds during transactions • fast transactions • decentralized data storage • free integration with operating businesses • user friendly and convenient service for customers and for vendors. • Products rating system

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io fees do not exceed 2% for all our partners, and it is just 0.5% for major partners. In addition, BCShop.io does not have any extra hidden fees and, more than that, implements integration and further support according to our partners` requests for free.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we able to offer such good conditions? There are a few reasons: 1. As we use blockchain, we do not need our own data centers, we do not have to cover the costs of maintaining data integrity and protecting data from hackers. 2. Cost of making a transaction and creating a product/service offer in Ethereum cryptocurrency is just a few cents. 3. BCShop.io business model does not involve gaining profits by the company itself. All gathered fees are aggregated to a specially created smart contract and are weekly distributed between token holders. This approach allows the company organizational activity costs to remain as low as possible. 4. Use of smart contracts makes it possible to achieve maximum formalization of a seller`s product/service offer, automate delivery processes in general and money back function in particular, with no extra fees.

Author: bcsmember
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io solves the problem of conversion fees by avoiding using its own currency and instead, maintaining all transactions in “native” Ethereum currency. That being said, by working with our service users will save time and money.

It will allow to understand the nature BCShop.io in simple and intuitive way. - Couple more rounds of airdrops will be held. Everyone can join to get familiar with our platform and to receive some promo-tokens in the proccess.

Body: For extra protection against dishonest vendors, the rating system considers the price which the product was purchased for. That makes it impossible to drive up the ratings by offering a very low price and then start to sell the product for a high price; as the first negative rating will overpower all the positive ratings.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: In more common cases, when a vendor needs to set the interaction between sales on BCShop with their own sales channels and data, interaction with a standard set of external functions takes place. These functions implement features necessary for the vendor, as well as administer support of the smart contract state relevance. Body: BCShop.io fees do not exceed 2% for all our partners, and it is just 0.5% formajor partners. In addition, BCShop.io does not have any extra hidden fees and,more than that, implements integration and further support according to our partners` requests for free.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io solves the problem of conversion fees by avoiding using its own currency and instead, maintaining all transactions in “native” Ethereum currency. That being said, by working with our service users will save time and money.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: All BCShop.io transactions are performed by using the Ethereum blockchain. With it, an average transaction completion time is just a few minutes, regardless of the sender and recipient location.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io arranges a product/service to be delivered as a smart contract which already includes controlling most of the necessary features: account of the product volume for sale, ability to establish money back timeline with automated free processing, and ability of wholesale opportunities.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io offers its users the chance to keep up with the times, broaden the range of potential customers with cryptocurrency holders. Our service is not a just another payment gate, but a fully-featured solution for the future economy based on blockchain.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a summary rate for the vendor, based on all the products offered by the vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Payment within the BCShop.io service means transferring Ethereum cryptocurrency for digital product or service (DPS) to the smart contact defining the conditions of sale/providing this DPS. P

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Vendors create smart contracts with the help of our website bcshop.io. To do this a vendor just fills in the blank fields related to their business, they do not need to have any specific technical knowledge. The result of creating a smart contract is the address of this smart contract. Created smart contracts are signed with a vendor`s private key and are stored on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: In case of automated delivery, payments are tracked with the help of BCShopApp application running on vendors end. The application keeps record and performs delivery of the product in accordance with a set algorithm. See chapter BCShopApp for more details.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShopApp, the application for delivering DPS (digital product or service), tracks activity of public key relevant to this DPS and processes incoming payments automatically. Processing usually comes down to sending a letter with the product code or some other action relevant to providing DPS from the vendor`s side (for example, transferring game currency).

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: In more common cases, when a vendor needs to set the interaction between sales on BCShop with their own sales channels and data, interaction with a standard set of external functions takes place. We provide the implementation of such functions according to vendors’ needs. The implementation of the functions may be as well done by vendors themselves.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We are happy to present BCShop.io: a universal service for selling digital goods or  services as  software  codes,  game  currency,  e-books,  discount  coupons, online conference tickets, electronic tickets to live events, etc. How are we able to offer such good conditions? There are a few reasons: 1.As we use blockchain, we do not need our own data centers, we do not have to cover the costs of maintaining data integrity and protecting data from hackers. 2.Cost of making a transaction and creating a product/service offer in Ethereum cryptocurrency is just a few cents. 3.BCShop.io  business  model  does  not  involve  gaining  profits  by  the  company itself. All gathered fees are aggregated to a specially created smart contract and are  weekly  distributed  between  token  holders.  This  approach  allows  the company organizational activity costs to remain as low as possible. 4.Use of smart contracts makes it possible to achieve maximum formalization of a  seller`s  product/service  offer,  automate  delivery  processes  in  general  and money back function in particular, with no extra fees.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: 56% tokens + tokens left from preTGE (if any) will be distributed during TGE. Upon TGE completion non-allocated tokens will be burnt, so all token holders will get an extra bonus in the form of increase of their own shares in bonuses distribution.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Tokens will be available for exchange through reserve within the first few days after TGE is finished. Tokens in reserve do not participate in bonus distribution. So, when some token holders sell their tokens, that will increase bonus tokens for other token holders.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: When traditional payment methods are used, there is no possibility to integrate automatic processing   for every   payment.   Vendors   usually   have   to   arrange   this   processing additionally,  at  the  stage  of  issuing  invoices  or/and  after  the  payment  is  received. Frequently part of the functions is implemented with the help of online stores or other ready solutions. However, that requires spending extra time and money.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An average fee that sellers have to pay for each received online payment today is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More than that, users usually should pay a fee for transferring money out from the payment system to the bank account. Besides, payment systems charge additional money back fees, may charge inactive account fees, cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Body: https://image.prntscr.com/image/jlct_nTYT2elgokC59mULA.jpg  Our platform is aimed at simplification, price reduction, and the improvement of service during hosting such events. We offer a convenient, decentralized, solution that possesses a variety of advantages:  1. No intermediaries in making payments and saving on fees 2. Automated payments registration and tickets delivery 3. The possibility to get a refund automatically (if expressed in the event terms and conditions) 4. Holding a webinar on the base of Google Hangouts, automated participants admission and tickets check.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShopApp,  the application for delivering DPS(digital  product  or  service),tracks activity of   public   key   relevant   to   this   DPS   and   processes   incoming   payments automatically.  Processing  usually  comes  down  to  sending  a  letter  with  the  product code  or  some  other  action  relevant to  providing DPS  from  the  vendor`s  side  (for example, transferring game currency).

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io solves the problem of conversion fees by avoiding using its own currency and instead, maintaining all transactions in “native” Ethereum currency. That being said, by working with our service users will save time and money.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Speaking of other projects, there are companies that have recently finished a successful ICO, and they are aimed at receiving payments in their own currency units (tokens). However, their users have to exchange basic Ethereum currency to particular tokens before they are able to use the project services. This exchange is also associated with paying fees, which means additional time is spent by the user.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We constantly monitor technological development and consider the possibility of integration with other blockchains supporting smart contracts, which offer enough opportunities to implement BCShop.io functionality.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: In more common cases, when a vendor needs to set the interaction between sales on BCShop with their own sales channels and data, interaction with a standard set of external functions takes place. These functions implement features necessary for the vendor, as well as administer support of the smart contract state relevance. We provide the implementation of such functions according to vendors’ needs. The implementation of the functions may be as well done by vendors themselves.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: With the help of BCShop.io one can place an offer selling a digital service or product on blockchain within just a few clicks and potential customers can also complete the purchase with only a few clicks. It is worth noting a buyer completes the transaction in ETH and does notneed to buy any special tokens.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io allows to completely automate the trade due to use of smart contracts and its own delivery application. The application continuously processes incoming payments, which guarantees delivering purchased products to the buyer. Furthermore, the vendor does not have to worry about keeping and protecting information about the product – all necessary data is stored on blockchain.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: For extra protection against dishonest vendors, the rating system considers the price which the product was purchased for. That makes it impossible to drive up the ratings by offering a very low price and then start to sell the product for a high price; as the first negative rating will overpower all the positive ratings. When viewing a product, buyers can also see a summary vendor rating, which is calculated based on the summary ratings of all the products offered by that vendor.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we able to offer such good conditions? There are a few reasons:  1. As we use blockchain, we do not need our own data centers, we do not have to cover the costs of maintaining data integrity and protecting data from hackers.  2. Cost of making a transaction and creating a product/service offer in Ethereum cryptocurrency is just a few cents. 3. BCShop.io business model does not involve gaining profits by the company itself. All gathered fees are aggregated to a specially created smart contract and are weekly distributed between token holders. This approach allows the company organizational activity costs to remain as low as possible.  4. Use of smart contracts makes it possible to achieve maximum formalization of a seller`s product/service offer, automate delivery processes in general and money back function in particular, with no extra fees.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Quite often a buyer cannot purchase a product in the seller`s currency. In this case, a purchase is made through automatic conversion; whether at the rate estimated by the payment system or at the processing operator (Visa/ Mastercard) rate (if the buyer pays with a credit card). A regular fee charged is no less than 1%. In some cases, users face double conversion, and then they must pay even more fees.

Body: BCShop.io offers its users the chance to keep up with the times, broaden the range of potential customers with cryptocurrency holders. Our service is not a just another payment gate, but a fully-featured solution for the future economy based on blockchain.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is BCShop.io? BCShop.io  is  a  platform  for  selling  digital  products  and  services,  based  on  smart - contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. BCShop.io allows vendors to publish information about digital products and services, and    customers – to    purchase    these    products    and    services    for    Ethereum cryptocurrency. At that, all the data concerning products is stored as a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: As for today, PreSale will be running for two more months during which we expect many interesting things to happen: - Full cycle alfa vesrion will be released. It will allow vendors to create “vendor smart-contracts” and “digital goods smart-contracts” and buyers to access those contracts to make a purchase. - We will do some networking at upcoming blockchain conferences and workshops in Moscow and (probably) Saint-Petersburg. - We will finish our pitch deck and present it to the public. It will allow to understand the nature BCShop.io in simple and intuitive way. - Couple more rounds of airdrops will be held. Everyone can join to get familiar with our platform and to receive some promo-tokens in the proccess.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: With the help of BCShop.io one can place an offer selling a digital service or product on blockchain within just a few clicks and potential customers can also complete the purchase with only a few clicks. It is worth noting a buyer completes the transaction in ETH and does notneed to buy any special tokens.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io  fees  do  not  exceed  2%  for  all  our  partners,  and  it  is  just  0.5%  for major partners.  In addition, BCShop.io does not have any extra hidden fees and, more than that, implements integration and further support according to our partners` requests for free.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why do you use two different tokens? Our task is to increase the volume of long-term investments relative to speculative, so we introduce such mechanics that will stimulate holding the BCS tokens longer. We believe that this approach will create a more healthy ecosystem of our project in the long term.

Independently from tokens listing on stock exchange, liquidity problem is solved by using bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). Tokens will be available for exchange within the first few days after TGE completion.

However, their users have to exchange basic Ethereum currency to particular tokens before they are able to use the project services. This exchange is also associated with paying fees, which means additional time is spent by the user.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShopApp,  the application for delivering DPS(digital  product  or  service),tracks activity of   public   key   relevant   to   this   DPS   and   processes   incoming   payments automatically.  Processing  usually  comes  down  to  sending  a  letter  with  the  product code  or  some  other  action  relevant to  providing DPS  from  the  vendor`s  side  (for example, transferring game currency).

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io solves the problem of conversion fees by avoiding using its own currency and instead, maintaining all transactions in “native” Ethereum currency. That being said, by working with our service users will save time and money.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An  average  fee  that  sellers  have  to  pay  for  each  received  online  payment  today  is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More  than  that,  users  usually  should  pay  a  fee  for  transferring  money  out from  the  payment  system  to  the  bank  account.  Besides,  payment  systems  charge additional   moneyback fees,   may   charge inactive account   fees,   cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

It will allow vendors to create “vendor smart-contracts” and “digital goods smart-contracts” and buyers to access those contracts to make a purchase. - We will do some networking at upcoming blockchain conferences and workshops in Moscow and (probably) Saint-Petersburg. - We will finish our pitch deck and present it to the public. It will allow to understand the nature BCShop.io in simple and intuitive way. - Couple more rounds of airdrops will be held. Everyone can join to get familiar with our platform and to receive some promo-tokens in the proccess.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Tokens received during TGE are assigned to the owner until TGE ends, after that they can be transferred / sold freely.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: To conduct PreTGE, TGE and operating activities, BCShop.io PTE LTD.  is registered (Singapore) in order to maximize compliance with legal requirements and recommendations of regulatory authorities.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Funds raised during TGE will be received to a smart-contract, which restricts their withdrawal. Monthly withdrawal cannot exceed 8% of the raised funds. That creates even allocation of budgets and balanced project self-financing for more than 12 months. This period is planned for the project to reach selfrepayment by means of fees received to the team tokens.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Funds raised during TGE will be allocated to financing the team work, marketing, legal fees, and outsourcing. We plan to expand our programmer team in an effort to better integrate solutions for our vendors.

Body: With the help of our application, game currency can be purchased directly from the seller, without using any third-party. This considerably lowers fees and increases privacy.

Author: firstsmmmman
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: A user can choose between two purchase options:  1. Providing the e-mail during the transaction. After purchase has been done, a code which the user enters in the game to get premium currency is automatically sent to that e-mail.  2. Providing the game nickname during the transaction - if the vendor supports this function. In this case, premium currency will be immediately deposited to the provided nickname account.
