Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a summary rate for the vendor, based on all the products offered by the vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: So, when viewing information about a product or a vendor, the customer sees a true-life experience of other customers dealing with this product/vendor.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Processes of creating smart contracts and making payments are frequently mentioned in the whitepaper. Please, note: 1. Payment within the BCShop.io service means transferring Ethereum cryptocurrency for digital product or service (DPS) to the smart contact defining the conditions of sale/providing this DPS. Payment can be done by any Ethereum Wallet which supports smart contracts feature or by a more convenient service – on our website bcshop.io. Usually to make a payment a user needs to provide information defining the delivery address: for example, email or game nickname. 2. Vendors create smart contracts with the help of our website bcshop.io. To do this a vendor just fills in the blank fields related to their business, they do not need to have any specific technical knowledge. The result of creating a smart contract is the address of this smart contract. Created smart contracts are signed with a vendor`s private key and are stored on the Ethereumblockchain.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: A vendor who wants to use our service first should complete registration which will result in receiving an address of their personal smart contract (further VendorContract). During the registration, a vendor needs to only fill in one necessary blank field: the Ethereum wallet address which will receive the payment for delivered products or services. Additionally, the vendor can fill in the field: Vendor Name (not required).

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Registration of digital products and services (DPS) for sale is done with the help of our website bcshop.io. To do this a vendor needs to provide their Vendor Contract and fill in a few blank fields describing the DPS (see Creating a DPS offer). As a result of the registration the seller gets the address of registered DPS smart contract (further DPS contract) which buyers will use for payments.

Body: A  buyer  pays  for  DPS  by  transferring the necessary  amount  of  ETH  to  the  DPS contract. Received payment is processed according to the contract conditions. If the payment amount is correct, the DPS is not sold out, and other checks are successful, the payment is then divided into two parts: 1.Profit – is deposited to the vendor`s wallet that is connected to the Vendor Contract. 2.Transaction fee – is deposited   to   a smart   contract   for   commission aggregation. See BCS Token and Business Model for more information about commission aggregation and distribution.

Processing  usually  comes  down  to  sending  a  letter  with  the  product code  or  some  other  action  relevant to  providing DPS  from  the  vendor`s  side  (for example, transferring game currency).  Processed  payments  are  accordingly  marked  by  using  smart  contract.  All  the  data related to DPS sale terms is also stored on blockchain.

Body: Additionally, BCShopApp can send invoices with the name of the vendor and product, purchase date, and paid amount to the user. For  users`  convenience  the  delivery  application can  also  generate various sales reports with an option of sending themto the provided e-mail.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: In the simplest cases, when selling through BCShop.io is the only sale method, all the data concerning products including payment and delivery is stored on blockchain. In more common cases, when a vendor needs to set the interaction between sales on BCShop  with  their  own  sales  channels  and  data, interaction  with  a  standard  set  of external functions takes place. These functions implement features necessary for the vendor,  as  well  as administer  support of  the  smart  contract  state  relevance.  We provide  the  implementation  of  such  functions  according to vendors’ needs.  The implementation of the functions may be as well done by vendors themselves.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: To  get  the  funds  back,  a  buyer  just  needs  to  call  the  contract MoneyBack function within the stated timeline or use the corresponding option on our website. To guarantee the MoneyBack function, funds received to the vendor`s account are put on hold until the established MoneyBack timeline is over.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: All actions connected to MoneyBack, excluding flow of payment funds, are defined by a vendor and the work field. For example: •A  webinar  which  allows  a  participant  to  use MoneyBack and leave  the webinar within first 10 minutes. • Periodic  information  services  subscription,  which  allows  a  subscriber  to use MoneyBack and decline further use of the subscription within a certain period after it started.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: An  average  fee  that  sellers  have  to  pay  for  each  received  online  payment  today  is about 3.5%, while selling fees for some online payment systems exceed 5-10%. These figures are especially high for some business spheres like those of gambling or sports betting. More  than  that,  users  usually  should  pay  a  fee  for  transferring  money  out from  the  payment  system  to  the  bank  account.  Besides,  payment  systems  charge additional   oney back fees,   may   charge inactive account   fees,   cross-border transaction fees, annual (monthly) fees, etc.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io  fees  do  not  exceed  2%  for  all  our  partners,  and  it  is  just  0.5%  for major partners.  In addition, BCShop.io does not have any extra hidden fees and, more than that, implements integration and further support according to our partners` requests for free.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we able to offer such good conditions? There are a few reasons: 1.As we use blockchain, we do not need our own data centers, we do not have to cover the costs of maintaining data integrity and protecting data from hackers. 2.Cost of making a transaction and creating a product/service offer in Ethereum cryptocurrency is just a few cents. 3.BCShop.io  business  model  does  not  involve  gaining  profits  by  the  company itself. All gathered fees are aggregated to a specially created smart contract and are  weekly  distributed  between  token  holders.  This  approach  allows  the company organizational activity costs to remain as low as possible. 4.Use of smart contracts makes it possible to achieve maximum formalization of a  seller`s  product/service  offer,  automate  delivery  processes  in  general  and money back function in particular, with no extra fees.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: CShop.io solves the problem of conversion fees by avoiding using its own currency and instead, maintaining all transactions in “native” Ethereum currency. That being said, by working with our service users will save time and money.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Sometimes  buyers  need  to  send  payments  by  means  of bank  transfer.  In  this  case, time necessary to complete a transaction may take up to a few business  days; especially with international transfers, and that is extremely inconvenient for the user.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: All BCShop.io transactions are performed by using the Ethereum blockchain. With it,  an  average  transaction  completion  time  is  just  a  few  minutes,  regardless  of  the sender and recipient location.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io arranges a product/service to be delivered as a smart contract which already includes controlling most of the necessary features: account of the product volume for sale, ability to establish money back timeline with automated free processing, and ability of wholesale opportunities.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io offers its users the chance to keep up with the times, broaden the range of potential  customers  with  cryptocurrency  holders.  Our  service  is  not  a  just  another payment  gate,  but  a  fully-featured  solution  for  the  future  economy  based  on blockchain.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Moreover, upon request, BCShop.io implements integration with external, out-of�blockchain world for interrelation with other sale channels, and for implementing other required features for its vendors.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Quite often customers do not have an opportunity to rate products purchased or view other customers` product ratings and sellers` performance. Sometimes this problem is solved with the help of third-party services, or vendors themselves install extra features. None of these approaches guarantee authenticity of the data seen by the customer. Ideally only customers who have really purchased a product should have the opportunity to rate it. Smart contracts make implementation of such features possible on the essential level.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Our  platform  is  aimed  at  simplification,  price  reduction,  and  the  improvement  of service  during  hosting  such  events.  We  offer  a  convenient,  decentralized,  solution that possesses a variety of advantages: 1. No intermediaries in making payments and saving on fees 2. Automated payments registration and tickets delivery 3.The possibility to get a refund automatically (if expressed in the event terms and conditions) 4. Holding a webinar on the base of Google Hangouts, automated participants admission and tickets check.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We are happy to present BCShop.io: a universal service for selling digital goods or services as  software  codes,  game  currency,  e-books,  discount  coupons, online conference tickets, electronic tickets to live events, etc.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io solves the problem of conversion fees by avoiding using its own currency and instead, maintaining all transactions in “native” Ethereum currency. That being said, by working with our service users will save time and money.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io   allows   to   completely automate the   trade   due   to   use   of   smart contracts   and   its   own   delivery   application.   The   application   continuously processes    incoming    payments,    which    guarantees    delivering    purchased products to the buyer. Furthermore, the vendor does not have to worry about keeping  and  protecting  information  about  the  product – all  necessary  data  is stored on blockchain.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar? The major difference is on the fundamental level – it is use of the mechanism which the platform is based on. BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Our main competitive advantages: •low fees •no required conversion of funds during transactions •fast transactions •decentralized data storage •free integration with operating businesses •user friendly and convenient service for customers and for vendors. •Products rating system

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Funds gained from selling 5% of the tokens at TGE stage will be used to create a reserve for implementing bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). This is the way to reach independence from the stock markets.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Bancor protocol allows tokens to participate in exchange (purchase/sale) without any need in being listed on exchanges. Tokens can be purchased/ sold from the reserve unilaterally, and the price will be defined by current reserve volume. Token price decreases with the reserve volume growth, and increases with the reserve depletion. That allows to create supply and demand balance and form token price. No fees apply when working with the reserve, which makes this approach more profitable in comparison with exchange trade.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Tokens will be available for exchange through reserve within the first few days after TGE is finished. Tokens in reserve do not participate in bonus distribution. So, when some token holders sell their tokens, that will increase bonus tokens for other token holders.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Up to 12% tokens will be distributed during PreTGE stage (TGE – token generating event) Early investors will receive a 50% token bonus; that being said, 150 BCS tokens will be deposited for 1 ETH.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Nowadays  organizing events  as  private  consultancy,  paid  webinars,  tutoring,  etc. requires the organizer to do a lot of routing work; to be able to provide high quality service, they also quite often invest money.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Let  us  consider  some  organizational  challenges  with  the  example  of  conducting  a commercial webinar: 1. Searching  for  a  platform  where  the  information  about  the  upcoming webinar will be shown. 2. Searching  for  a  platform  where  this  webinar  will  be  held.  In  most  cases there is a fee for using this platform. 3. Gathering funds, participants registration, providing a form of tickets (for example, password to enter the webinar) is performed by the organizers themselves. Very often, they must spend their time registering every single participant, which is very time consuming. 4.Account of participants during the webinar. Screening unfair participants who have not paid for the entrance but gained the access by fraud.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Let us consider some difficulties and risks from a participant’s side: 1.Need to make payments by methods convenient for the organizer, not the client, often with additional bank fees. 2.Very   often,   the   inability   to   get   compensation   in   cases   of   webinar cancellation, or a performer’s incompetence/carelessness. 3.Frequently,  the  inability  to  leave  a  review  about  the  webinar  for  future clients, due to the platform’s restricted functions. 4.Often, the inability to stay anonymous in a case where a client would prefer to do that.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Our  platform  is  aimed  at  simplification,  price  reduction,  and  the  improvement  of service  during  hosting  such  events.  We  offer  a  convenient,  decentralized,  solution that possesses a variety of advantages: 1. No intermediaries in making payments and saving on fees 2. Automated payments registration and tickets delivery 3.The possibility to get a refund automatically (if expressed in the event terms and conditions) 4. Holding a webinar on the base of Google Hangouts, automated participants admission and tickets check.

Besides, there are various advantages of buying them at BCSop.io in comparison with regular e-tickets: 1.No intermediaries in making payments and saving on selling fees 2.Ticket is protected from duplication due to use of encryption. 3.A ticket can be presented for verification as a QR code electronically, as well as on paper. 4.Immediate verification by the organizer by using an app developed by our company.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Every purchase is recorded in the product smart contract, which automatically creates a positive product rating. In the case of the vendor`s poor performance or if there is a complaint about the product, a buyer is able to change positive feedback for negative and tell future customers about their negative experience.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Rating system is established at the smart contracts level and it is based on the experience of real customers only.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: For extra protection against dishonest vendors, the rating system considers the price which the product was purchased for. That makes it impossible to drive up the ratings by offering a very low price and then start to sell the product for a high price; as the first negative rating will overpower all the positive ratings. When viewing a product, buyers can also see a summary vendor rating, which is calculated based on the summary ratings of all the products offered by that vendor.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCS tokens will be issued at PreTGE and TGE stage, it will be a one-time issuing, and the quantity will be limited. BCS is a standard ERC20 token based on the Ethereum platform. Project business model and role of tokens: 1. Funds for project development and its integration with various vendors are raised at the stage of issuing tokens. 2. At the stage of the project operation, tokens will serve for exchanging for bonuses among their holders. Bonuses can be used to pay for goods and services inside BCShop.io platform. 3. Profits will be generated through a small sales fee (0.5%-2%), which will be withheld from every payment (from the vendor`s side) and will be received to a separate smart contract. 80% of the fees will be used to provide bonus tokens with ETH value. Every owner of the BCS token can trigger a specific function of the smart contract to get the amount of bonuses that he hasaccumulated in exchange for 1 BCS token. 4. The commission and bonuses are the fuel for the economic system of our project, the give the commodity value to the tokens.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io allows to completely automate the trade due to use of smart contracts and its own delivery application. The application continuously processes incoming payments, which guarantees delivering purchased products to the buyer. Furthermore, the vendor does not have to worry about keeping and protecting information about the product – all necessary data is stored on blockchain.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is BCShop.io? BCShop.io  is  a  platform  for  selling  digital  products  and  services,  based  on  smart-contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. BCShop.io allows vendors to publish information about digital products and services, and    customers – to    purchase    these    products    and    services    for    Ethereum cryptocurrency. At that, all the data concerning products is stored as a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is the difference between BCShop and regular payment gateways?  First of all, it is much easier to create a product or service offer through BCShop: you do not need your own website, you do not need to register in payment gates, and you do not need a server for storing shop activity data. All the data related to a service or product sale terms, as well as related to completed transactions  is  stored  on  blockchain. In  comparison  to  the  classical  approach,  your shop  is  much  more  protected  against  any  hacking  or  data  loss,  as blockchain guarantees a more efficient means of protection for your data. When  working  with  payments  gateways  you  should  resolve  all  issues  with  the product  delivery  yourself  and  you  should  control  the  process.  If  you  are  using  our service, you can download a standard BCShop App and set it up (yourself or with our help), this will  immediately  resolve  the  issue  of  your  customers  receiving  products automatically.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Is BCShop anonymous? BCShop does  not  change  degree  of  anonymity of Ethereum. Buyer`s  e-mail  (or identification),   which   a   buyer   provides   for   receiving   a product,   is   stored   on blockchain in the encrypted form.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are you going to solve the problem of ETH volatility? According to the contract a vendor can recalculate the price of all their DPS contracts at the determined rate.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why  is  BCShop.io  different  from GameCredits,  SkinCoin,  BlockTix and  other similar projects? First, a user does not need to buy special tokens to purchase game currency, skins or tickets as in the projects mentioned above. Payment is made directly in ETH. Second,  as  opposed  to  mentioned  above  highly  specialized  projects,BCShop.io  is more general and can be applied to a larger number of varied fields. Therefore, BCShop.io solves the problem of stock exchange liquidity and listing due to bancor  protocol, so that a tokens holder  can exchange them at any moment , and anybody can become a holder. Fourth,  unlike  the  mentioned  above  projects,  BCShop.io  has  a  built-in customer products rating system based on smart-contracts.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is BCS token? The  BCS  token allows  its  owners  to  receive  BCB  tokens,  which  can  be  spent  on  the BCShop.io platform to purchase digital goods and services.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is BCB token? BCB bonus tokens are used within the platform to receive a 100% discount on the purchase of goods and services , at a rate of 1000 BCB tokens = 1 ETH.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why do you use two different tokens? Our task is to increase the volume of long-term investments relative to speculative, so we introduce such mechanics that will stimulate holding the BCS tokens longer. We believe that this approach will create a more healthy ecosystem of our project in the long term.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Independently from tokens listing on stock exchange, liquidity problem is solved by using bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why is there a limited number of investors during PreTGE stage? At  this  stage,  our  task  is  to  provide  an  individual  approach  and  maximum  security within   the   available   resources.   We   believe   that   working   with   each   investor individually,  we  will  be  able  to  conduct  the  PreTGE  campaign  as  efficiently  as possible.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Can I mine BCS tokens? No, BCS tokens can’t be mined.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar?  The major difference is on the fundamental level–it is use of the mechanism which the platform  is  based  on.  BCShop.io  is  actually  based on  blockchain,  with  the  use  of  smart contracts,  while  OpenBazaar  is,  in  fact,  local  (requires  installing  special  software)  and exchange  of  data  between the  users  is  already  an  add-on. Besides  that,  BCShop.io possesses other distinguishing features: •possibility of integration with business •automated payments processing and products delivery option •exclusive trade of digital products and services only •access from any device with no special software required •controlling of payments and products account at the level of smart contracts

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: All BCShop.io transactions are performed by using the Ethereum blockchain. With it,  an  average  transaction  completion  time  is  just  a  few  minutes,  regardless  of  the sender and recipient location.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io  arranges  a  product/service  to  be  delivered  as  a  smart  contract  which already includes  controlling  most of the  necessary features: account of the  product volume  for  sale, ability  to  establish  money  back timeline  with  automated  free processing, and ability of wholesale opportunities.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io offers its users the chance to keep up with the times, broaden the range of potential  customers  with  cryptocurrency  holders.  Our  service  is  not  a  just  another payment  gate,  but  a  fully-featured  solution  for  the  future  economy  based  on blockchain.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a  summary  rate  for  the  vendor,  based  on  all  the products  offered  by  the  vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Payment within  the  BCShop.io  service  means  transferring  Ethereum cryptocurrency for digital product or service (DPS) to the smart contact defining the conditions of sale/providing this DPS.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Is BCShop anonymous? BCShop does  not  change  degree  of  anonymity of Ethereum. Buyer`s  e-mail  (or identification),   which   a   buyer   provides   for   receiving   a product,   is   stored   on blockchain in the encrypted form.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is BCShop.io? BCShop.io  is  a  platform  for  selling  digital  products  and  services,  based  on  smart - contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. BCShop.io allows vendors to publish information about digital products and services, and    customers – to    purchase    these    products    and    services    for    Ethereum cryptocurrency. At that, all the data concerning products is stored as a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar? The major difference is on the fundamental level – it is use of the mechanism which the platform  is  based  on.  BCShop.io  is  actually  based on  blockchain,  with  the  use  of  smart contracts,  while  OpenBazaar  is,  in  fact,  local  (requires  installing  special  software)  and exchange  of  data  between the  users  is  already  an  add-on. Besides  that,  BCShop.io possesses other distinguishing features: •possibility of integration with business •automated payments processing and products delivery option •exclusive trade of digital products and services only •access from any device with no special software required •controlling of payments and products account at the level of smart contracts

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: How are we different from OpenBazaar? The major difference is on the fundamental level – it is use of the mechanism which the platform is based on. BCShop.io is actually based on blockchain, with the use of smart contracts, while OpenBazaar is, in fact, local (requires installing special software) and exchange of data between the users is already an add-on.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: What is BCShop.io? BCShop.io  is  a  platform  for  selling  digital  products  and  services,  based  on  smart - contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. BCShop.io allows vendors to publish information about digital products and services, and    customers – to    purchase    these    products    and    services    for    Ethereum cryptocurrency. At that, all the data concerning products is stored as a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain.

Body: What is BCBtoken? BCB bonus tokens are used within the platform to receive a 100% discount on the purchase of goods and services, at a rate of 1000 BCB tokens = 1 ETH.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why do you use two different tokens? Our task is to increase the volume of long-term investments relative to speculative, so we introduce such mechanics that will stimulate holding the BCS tokens longer. We believe that this approach will create a more healthy ecosystem of our project in the long term.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Do you plan listing BCS tokens on stock exchange?  We   will   send   listing   applications   to   all   of   the   recognized   stock   exchanges. Independently from tokens listing on stock exchange, liquidity problem is solved by using bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). Tokens will be available for exchange within the first few days after TGEcompletion.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Why is there a limited number of investors during PreTGE stage? At  this  stage,  our  task  is  to  provide  an  individual  approach  and  maximum  security within   the   available   resources.   We   believe   that   working   with   each   investor individually,  we  will  be  able  to  conduct  the  PreTGE  campaign  as  efficiently  as possible.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: CShop.io  arranges  a  product/service  to  be  delivered  as  a  smart  contract  which already includes  controlling  most of the  necessary features:account of the  product volume  for  sale, ability  to  establish  money  back timeline  with  automated  free processing, and ability of wholesale opportunities.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io has a built-in system for rating each product, and it automatically creates a  summary  rate  for  the  vendor,  based  on  all  the products  offered  by  the  vendor. Rating mechanisms are integrated into the smart contract, which guarantees for data authenticity, and it eliminates the possibility of commonly used fraud ratings.

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Author: Gecko8
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: I manage for telegram and Medium. Not for twitter unfortunately, this one was strange. Thanks for 8 coins in total. Unfortunately my wish was not considered, which was beeing the lucky one getting the 16  coin slot  . Not sure, how this wish topic will be handled in your future process. As with submitting the contract signature, the coins were immediately transfered. So if I translate this testing environment to your future business, how do you make sure, any wish will be regarded, which may impact your smart contract? This is a manual step, which would not scale your process. Any insights really appreciated.

Author: Gecko8
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Actually this leads me to my 2nd and 3rd question. How do you want to solve the problem of the need of gas. This was a very cumbersome process. Imaging future customer need to beg for gas I cannot see as a valid process. In addition, why is private keys required? Is there not a different way possible?

Author: bcshop.io
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Thanks everyone for participating.     The process of using gas is completely the same as with MyEtherWallet - the most popular wallet. You need gas for each transaction, though amount is so small so you barely notice it.

Author: Gecko8
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: But you should think about customers, which are not used to this. if I understood your concept correctly, with your concept you want to reach not just crypto currencies nurds but actually a market place of new users.

Author: Gecko8
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: And the other question is for me still open. How do you plan to deal with those wishes. I assume, this was one aspect of your testing. Or was it only a traffic testing for services teams?

Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: You can get up to 10 tokens per one channel from 1 airdrop. There are 3 different channels. All airdrops are free, all you need is to join social media. There will be several rounds of airdrops so you can accumulate even more tokens. Each token is worth ~3$, participating in each airdrop in every channel can easily give you 50$+. For nothing in exchange.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: [TGE] Dates: 18.12.2017 – 31.01.2018 Minimum contribution: no restriction Contribution currency: ETH Maximum investors: no restriction Contribution bonus: 0% - 10% Hard cap: ~60 000 ETH (exact number set in tokens)

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Meanwhile, we are preparing to the PreTGE and TGE and at the same time continuing to work on the project. We will be adding new features to already functioning alpha version.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: A cohesive team with 9 years’ experience of collaborative development is working on BCShop.io. Team members have a solid track of analyzing large volumes of data, proven experience in long-term project management and project scaling, creating high load failover systems, complex systems formalization and algorithm development.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: Funds raised during TGE will be received to a smart-contract, which restricts their withdrawal. Monthly withdrawal cannot exceed 8% of the raised funds. That creates even allocation of budgets and balanced project self-financing for more than 12 months. This period is planned for the project to reach selfrepayment by means of fees received to the team tokens.

Author: coolsiu

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We are happy to present BCShop.io: a universal service for selling digital goods or  services as  software  codes,  game  currency,  e-books,  discount  coupons, online conference tickets, electronic tickets to live events, etc.

Author: goryakon
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop.io   allows   to   completely automate the   trade   due   to   use   of   smart -contracts   and   its   own   delivery   application.   The   application   continuously processes    incoming    payments,    which    guarantees    delivering    purchased products to the buyer. Furthermore, the vendor does not have to worry about keeping  and  protecting  information  about  the  product – all  necessary  data  is stored on blockchain.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We will send listing applications to all of the recognized stock exchanges. Independently from tokens listing on stock exchange, liquidity problem is solved by using bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). Tokens will be available for exchange within the first few days after TGE completion.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: First of all, it is much easier to create a product or service offer through BCShop: you do not need your own website, you do not need to register in payment gates, and you do not need a server for storing shop activity data. All the data related to a service or product sale terms, as well as related to completed transactions is stored on blockchain. In comparison to the classical approach, your shop is much more protected against any hacking or data loss, as blockchain guarantees a more efficient means of protection for your data. When working with payments gateways you should resolve all issues with the product delivery yourself and you should control the process. If you are using our service, you can download a standard BCShopApp and set it up (yourself or with our help), this will immediately resolve the issue of your customers receiving products automatically. The amount of investment required to start working with BCShop is $0 (zero)!

Author: bcshop.io
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: We will send listing applications to all of the recognized stock exchanges. Independently from tokens listing on stock exchange, liquidity problem is solved by using bancor protocol (www.bancor.network). Tokens will be available for exchange within the first few days after TGE completion.

Author: bcshop.io
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: First, a user does not need to buy special tokens to purchase game currency, skins or tickets as in the projects mentioned above. Payment is made directly in ETH. Second, as opposed to mentioned above highly specialized projects, BCShop.io is more general and can be applied to a larger number of varied fields. Therefore, BCShop.io solves the problem of stock exchange liquidity and listing due to bancor protocol, so that a tokens holder can exchange them at any moment, and anybody can become a holder. Fourth, unlike the mentioned above projects, BCShop.io has a built-in customer products rating system based on smart-contracts.

Author: bcshop.io
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: BCShop does not change degree of anonymity of Ethereum. Buyer`s e-mail (or identification), which a buyer provides for receiving a product, is stored on blockchain in the encrypted form.

Author: bcshop.io
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: First of all, it is much easier to create a product or service offer through BCShop: you do not need your own website, you do not need to register in payment gates, and you do not need a server for storing shop activity data.  All the data related to a service or product sale terms, as well as related to completed transactions is stored on blockchain. In comparison to the classical approach, your shop is much more protected against any hacking or data loss, as blockchain guarantees a more efficient means of protection for your data. When working with payments gateways you should resolve all issues with the product delivery yourself and you should control the process. If you are using our service, you can download a standard BCShopApp and set it up (yourself or with our help), this will immediately resolve the issue of your customers receiving products automatically.

Author: coolsiu
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: With the help of our application, game currency can be purchased directly from the seller, without using any third-party. This considerably lowers fees and increases privacy.

Author: bcshop.io
Title: [ANN][BOUNTY][AIRDROP FOR HOLDERS] BCShop.io - a marketplace on smart-contracts
Body: WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | MEDIUM  October progress update  https://medium.com/@bcshop.io/bcshop-io-october-progress-update-a2fbbc19eb7f  Some highlights:  1. We announced PreSale hard cap of 2000 ETH (~600 000$).  2. Alfa release is going to happen in less than a week. Screenshots are available in the report.  3. Partnership announcement with Bancor is scheduled for mid November.  4. Pre-agreement on using our platform is reached with Law&Trust International, leading ICO legal service provider in Russia and some other countries.  5. BCShop.io is sponsoring Moscow ICO conference at 7th of November. The project will be introduced to broader public and potential contributors.  [INTRODUCTION]   BCShop.io is a platform for selling digital products and services, based on smart-contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.  Explainer video (click the image):    BCShop.io allows vendors to publish information about digital products and services, and customers – to purchase these products and services for Ethereum cryptocurrency. At that, all the data concerning products is stored as a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain.  Use of smart contracts allows for automatization of payment processing and account of products. In the simplest cases, creating a digital product offer is done with only a few clicks and does not require vendors to install any software.    Purchasing digital products is a simple process too. Buyers make all payments in the Ethereum blockchain`s native currency – ETH.  Creating sale offers, as well as buying products is done with the use of software, based on MyEtherWallet – one of the most popular Ethereum online wallets. That allows the service to be used on both desktops and mobile devices.  BCShop.io is marketed as a solution for C2C (client to client), and for B2C (business to client). BCShop.io offers its business clients free development of integration solutions.  Our main competitive advantages:  •   low fees •   no required conversion of funds during transactions •   fast transactions •   decentralized data storage •   free integration with operating businesses •   user friendly and convenient service for customers and for vendors. •   Products rating system   [PRETGE]   Dates: 09.10.2017 – 15.12.2017 Minimum contribution: 20 ETH Contribution currency: ETH Maximum investors: 100 Contribution bonus: 50%   [TGE]   Dates: 16.01.2018 – 13.02.2018 Minimum contribution: no restriction Contribution currency: ETH Maximum investors: no restriction Contribution bonus: 0% - 10% Hard cap: ~60 000 ETH (exact number set in tokens)   [TOKEN BCS]      [BOUNTY]   If you are an author of an interesting and popular channel or blog in social networks, twitter, instagram, telegram or other social media, and are interested in advertising cooperation, we would like to discuss this possibility with you on an individual basis. For placing quality content in popular channels, we are ready to offer up to 1000 BCS tokens (in exceptional cases, more). Leave an application for participation here, or in a private message.  The application must include a link to the channel and your payment request. We do not consider advertising options in spam channels. Only channels with quality content, please.   [FREE AIRDROPs]  YOU SHOULD CLAIM YOUR BONUS TOKENS YOURSELF.  To participate in airdrop all you need is to follow our social media and tweet / like it. Time to time we will publish contract addresses so you can claim your bonus tokens. Read post below for more info.  In order to introduce users to BCShop.io platform we will be conducting several token AIRDROPS (giveaways) during next weeks.  Who can participate: anyone who has Ethereum wallet with ERC20 tokens support (for example, MyEtherWallet).  What you will get: BCS Promo tokens. Those tokens can be exchanged for real BCS tokens during Token Generating Event (TGE) which will start 10.01.2018. Exchange rate is 1:1.  What is BCS token: it is a token which is given to supporters of BCShop.io platform during TGE stage. Base price of 1 BCS token is 0.01 ETH.  How to participate:  1.   Join our telegram chat: https://t.me/joinchat/FxGXTULeqJEx0BlrVb4bsQ 2.   Follow our medium blog: https://medium.com/@bcshop.io 3.   Follow our twitter: https://twitter.com/BCShop_io  The first AIRDROP will be held between 02.10.2017 and 09.10.2017. In each channel we will publish different BCShop.io trade links. Example (demo): https://goo.gl/q45FhA. All you need is to follow the link and claim your promo tokens (don’t forget to make a wish ).  You are advised to use new Ethereum wallet, just in case. You will need to pay for the gas (~0.0004 ETH).  In each channel (telegram, medium and twitter) there will be different link. So you can receive promo tokens up to 3 times. There will be several airdrops so you can accumulate as much promo tokens as you can, all of them will be exchanged for BCS tokens during TGE stage.  Number of participants who can receive promo tokens is limited each AIRDROP. The limit of first round is 750, 250 for each channel.  We are adding little game twist to it: every participant gets 4 promo tokens, every 10th participant gets 8 promo tokens and every 50th participant gets 16 promo tokens.  If you have any questions, the fastest way to get an answer is in our telegram channel. Please be kind and try to help people, some of them don’t know what is Ethereum, tokens and so on. Let’s grow blockchain and Ethereum community bigger and speed up the economy and society revolution!   WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | MEDIUM
